SENT.plain: The authors describe a family in which two individuals have clinical distal myopathy with rimmed vacuoles (DMRV)

While the clinical and most of the pathologic features in these patients were compatible with a diagnosis of DMRV, the presence of inflammatory changes in the connective tissue between muscle fibers was not
Gene analysis revealed a compound heterozygous mutation in these individuals, characterized by V572L and I472T
